pkgmetadata.longdescription: Execute Pharmacometric Models Using 'shiny' // Execute Nonlinear Mixed Effects (NLME) models for pharmacometrics using a 'shiny' interface. Specify engine parameters and select from different run options, including simple estimation, stepwise covariate search, bootstrapping, simulation, visual predictive check, and more. Models are executed using the 'Certara.RsNLME' package.
